feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.11.02
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 8717997b0e16dc3c3e398309d2e2818238b26182 feature: Hovering over the execution dialog title shows the action ID and execution ID (#468)
  • 8fe91101dbe88d8ca7851a3962290c4259241544 feature: Log search box that is less visually offensive
  • 1bfb7c4b2853de8f31f207276cd598721770a7e8 feature: Logs table creates an entry as soon as the execution is started (#464)
  • 964dc7b48a93232212fee030870d2e7c8914eebd feature: Rerun button on execution dialog, easily rerun actions! (#465)

Bug fixes

  • ceb0a7818079c241fdff4d7c9010a979704da4d3 bugfix: Logout cookies causing a conflict (#461)
  • 9bcb2d80dc2a2ee6a6c3cd8c1e4e423d00ce50e1 bugfix: Logs table only updating on start, not finish (#467)
  • 209234c09f10d80dfcbfc6dc60d0f712eae6064d bugfix: Still hide an empty actions section if a section is currently selected (#469)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.11.02

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.11.02

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.11.09
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 13e48dded208f76738df83e85ecb4af29e64d0df feature: Better guest handling (#472)

Others

  • 344df3739dc0d3ab9c4c4f9c3adf571fe4ac68a3 build(deps): bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 (#473)
  • 0d981773b3ecef4bcacafb8b24d51424ea01001f fmt: gofmt

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.11.09

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.11.24
entry.content:
Changelog

Security

  • 79a411935183f479c3ef68ab74459f216761def7 security: Update cross-spawn vulnerable dependency (#482)

Features

  • f0b1cefb720077a50081dbed77886c0314c70816 feature: OAuth2 early support for CertBundles (#474) and Usergroups (#477) (#485)

Bug fixes

  • b4a555e3da5a3751eb7cd2bbd3ce21abd65df9ac bugfix: #481 StartActionAndWait now allows arguments. (#483)

Others

  • 851d0dac848ab775d60e9db5996725e57e55889c doc: Fix #478 - easy.cfg typo [skip ci]

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.11.24

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.11.24

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!
